topic.title: Can 0chan be(come) the Zite that will attract people to ZeroNet from outside?
topic.body:
Apparently [0chan](http://127.0.0.1:43110/0chan.bit) has the most peers (to be honest it has suspiciously many peers).

It also become quite active these days.  I can easily imagine that, if we concentrate some of our ZeroNet activity there regularly, we can turn 0chan to be a Zite attractive enough to bring outsiders to ZeroNet and also having some extra fun ;^) here on ZeroNet.

What do you think?
